update tb_attachment_server
attachment_server_name = #{attachmentServerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endpoint = #{endpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

access_url = #{accessUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
be_enabled = #{beEnabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where attachment_server_id = #{attachmentServerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_attachment_server set attachment_server_name = #{attachmentServerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endpoint = #{endpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_key_id = #{accessKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_key_secret = #{accessKeySecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_url = #{accessUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, be_enabled = #{beEnabled,jdbcType=TINYINT} where attachment_server_id = #{attachmentServerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tb_attachment_server where attachment_server_id=#{attachmentServerId} or attachment_server_name=#{attachmentServerName}
SELECT count(1) FROM tb_attachment_server where attachment_server_id!=#{attachmentServerId} and attachment_server_name=#{attachmentServerName}
